BlogData.title: Development
BlogData.heading: MERN Stack Web Development
BlogData.description: The MERN stack, comprising MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js, is a powerful framework for building full-stack web applications. MongoDB offers flexible, JSON-like data storage. Express.js is a minimalist framework for building robust web applications and APIs. React.js allows for dynamic and interactive user interfaces. Node.js provides a scalable, efficient JavaScript runtime for server-side development. Together, these technologies create a cohesive ecosystem for modern web application development.
BlogData.name: Saqlain Shah
